attributes.action: close all business in the UK for the coronavirus pandemic
attributes.background:
close all business , school , in the UK for the coronavirus epidemic .
leave only primary goods stores open.

rejection.details:
We understand that you want the Government close all businesses in the UK, except for primary goods stores, for the coronavirus pandemic, but we're not sure what you mean by primary goods stores.

There are already petitions asking for the Government to close schools and businesses.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300403
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300973

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
